title: (46240) Carlet - 21 Plaza Perfecto García Chorne
description: Parking in a sports car area but taking advantage of the space in the planter, there is room for a 7-person motorhome. We called the Local Police and they told us that there was no municipal ordinance prohibiting overnight stays in the municipality . 20 minutes from downtown. Quiet area to spend the night. Nice church in the town.

title: (46240) Carlet - 37 Avinguda de Vicent Andrés Estellés
title_short: (46240) Carlet - 37 Avinguda de Vicent Andrés Estellés
description: Public parking, we had a good night, bar in front, teenage sea at 600metres, police at 500 meters. Quiet.

title: (46230) Alginet - 106 Carrer Major
description: Flat parking lot with fine sand and trees on the outskirts of town. There are no services. Opposite there is a children's play area.

name: Bodega 2020
title: (46680) Bodega 2020
description: We are happy to welcome you in the parking lot of our tasting room. Our car park is an ideal stopover for wine lovers/campers. You can taste our house wines and tapas every day of the week. Free night with the purchase of 6 bottles. Arrival between 12:00 p.m. and 5:30 p.m. We speak Dutch, German, English, French and Spanish. Large campers (>9m) are also welcome. Reservations preferably via whatsapp or email. Saturday and Sunday we are closed!

title: (46230) Alginet - 188 Carrer Trullas
description: GPL LPG service station, very nice, you have to have your own adapter. no problem filling the tank

Not suitable for caravans, part of the access road somewhat narrow, suitable for large volumes up to L3 and perhaps L4, with no clearance limitations.

title: (46267) Gabarda - 151 CV-5590
description: Landscaped recreational area between poplars, willows and elms located next to the Puente del Rey, a civil engineering work carried out at the end of the 18th century and which was never finished. It can be visited at any time because it is outdoors in an environment surrounded by orange groves. There is a recreation area for the walk and it is part of a small cycle path or greenway that borders the course of the Júcar river. There is also an old brick kiln area accessed by a pedestrian ramp and near the bridge is a small amphitheater.

El Palmar hostelería association parking.

title: (46823) Navarrés - 165 Diseminado Diseminados

title: (46012) El Palmar - 155 Plaça Num 37

title: (46660) Manuel - 52 Plaça Numero 2

description: A very very quiet place we stayed one night and very beautiful

title: (46012) València - Carrer de Vicente Baldoví

title_short: (46012) València - 1 Carrer Ep P Martí Girbés

title: (46749) Carcaixent -
description: NO DOGS! Very large free municipal area, for mobile homes, caravans and tents, very well maintained. Closed on Mondays and Tuesdays and in August. Arrive before 6pm to be opened by the guard. Parking is limited to 48 hours. Locals come here to have picnics. Large playground, football and basketball field. Nice walks in the hills.

title: (46660) - 9042 Plaça Numero 1
description: Nice place in the middle of nature next to a sports area where there are toilets, showers and drinking water. there is a small bar in the sports area and a 5 minute walk you are in the city where you have all kinds of services, super market, bakery restaurants.

title: (46823) Navarrés - 6 Carretera Subida Calvario
description: Day and night parking is allowed as long as no 'trash' is taken out. Very beautiful views from the Ermita de Navarrés to the town, with some shade, a few picnic tables and next to a park, although it is now sealed off to rehabilitate it. Nearby you have the house of the Little Mouse Pérez and the corridor of pacifiers, very cool for little ones. Los Chorradores, Playamonte nearby and the Escalona dam also with a free bathing area

title: (46270) Villanueva De Castellón - 1 Plaça Poligono 10

description: We have come a long way, but not far enough.

name: Devesa Gardens Camping & Resort
title: (46012) Devesa Gardens Camping & Resort

title: (46823) Navarrés - 7 Avenida del Carmen
description: Asphalted parking in front of the Dulmatesa factory, perfect for hiking, seeing the town and making routes.

title: (46823) Navarrés - 20 Calle la Fuente

title: (46900) Torrent - 30 Carrer Toll-l'Alberca Calle B
description: Quiet on street parking, just off motorway. Frequented by long distance lorry drivers for thier overnight stops. There is an Aldi, a fuel station and a McDonalds within 50mts. Fairly level so no need for ramps.

name: Aparcamiento Los Chorradores

description: Ground parking 50m from the sea.

title: (46198) - 39 Diseminado Diseminados

There are a few benches and bins (no other services) It was a pleasure to wake up in this place. It would be great if we leave no trace (so also no toilet paper) so we can all keep enjoying this place! Enjoy!

title: (46420) Sueca - 18 Carrer de Vicente Ferrer Cardona
title_short: (46420) Sueca - 18 Carrer de Vicente Ferrer Cardona

title: (46900) Torrent - 11 Calle Prolongación Carlet
description: It is a normal car park but we have been struck by the large number of playgrounds in the area. This town, Torrent, is marked as a town dedicated to childhood. It is full of parks, there are bars and restaurants with areas for children, they have circuses and fairs frequently because of what you see, etc. Ideal to stop or spend the night with children to take their breaks on long trips. We have been great

title: (46012) Valencia - 13 Avenida Gola del Puchol
description: Roadside parking sheltered by groves. Close to the beach (public shower) and quiet at night if we ignore the few curious looking for meetings between men ...

title: (46295) Sellent - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area, with a good parking lot, where you can spend the night quietly in the middle of nature.

title: (46822) Bolbaite - 9 CV-580
description: Spectacular pine forest around the Santa Bárbara hermitage, surrounded by nature and with little passage of people since it is located at the top of the mountain. Within the area of the hermitage there are a multitude of picnic tables, barbecues, bathrooms, fountains and a restaurant. From there you can see beautiful views of Bolbaite and the castle. There is a first small, more feral parking lot and another one a little higher up with asphalt ground and street lamps (they turn off at 1.30 in the morning, leaving you completely in the dark at night). Perfect place for those looking for absolute tranquility in the middle from the field and let go of children and dogs. Careful! there are wild boars in the area. Trick of the house: in the bathrooms there is a plug, parking in the upper parking lot you can pull an extension cord and connect to the power :-) The same to fill water in the fountain behind the restaurant or in the bathroom sink: with a very long hose you can fill the tank. Garbage and glass containers available. Great as a base camp to visit the river. Another trick of the house: in the recreational area of the river (where you go down some stairs to it, in front of the cooperative) there is another accessible source hidden, with a little nose you can put the van or motorhome next to it.

title: (46900) Torrent - 4 Calle Escultor Vicente Pallardo
description: Large parking lot may be noisy as close to busy roads. We stayed only for lunch but there is no ban on staying there at night.

title: (46012) Valencia - 54 Calle Casbah Saler
description: Parking 30 meters from the beach. Great views of the sea and the wild place. Staying overnight prohibited

title: (46900) Torrent - 4-6 Travesía Rosendo Montoro
description: Leisure area, small tables ... With bathrooms and water. Ideal for eating. Playground for children. There is not much room for parking. Narrow streets.

title: (46900) Torrent - 5 Carrer Gaspar Navarro Piles
description: Laundromat, 2 machines, two dryers. WiFi zone. By cons try to park on the avenue because many cars parked in the street. Works with Euros. Possibility of changing tickets into coins. Located behind the National Polícia police station.

title: (46822) - 568 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Free parking for 3 places, on the outskirts of town. It is on the way to the farms, 3 minutes walk from the town. Tranquility day and night. Ideal for visiting the river bathing area.

title: (46824) - 6 Extrarradio Diseminados
description: Asphalt parking of the city sports center. drinking water, shade and parking. Climbing areas, via ferrata, river with pools for bathing just over 7 km away by paved road Access to the parking lot is a steep ramp but without problems for a motorhome. I travel with a 7.5m and I have not had a problem.

title: (46012) Valencia - 19 Diseminado Gola del Puchol
description: Beach of La Garrofera

title: (46012) Valencia - 11 Avenida Gola del Puchol
description: Parking lot of the day. A few meters from the beach. On the weekends there is a little traffic in the evening, but very quiet and no problem. Very popular with motorhomes.

title: (46408) Mareny de Sant Llorenç - 8 Carrer de L'Albufera
title_short: (46408) Mareny de Sant Llorenç - 8 Carrer de L'Albufera
description: It is in front of the La Beata Inés bakery, it is a dirt car park with no access problems. We have spent a night in silence, a very quiet place and nobody has come to tell us anything. At 7 in the morning a man walked his dog and that's it. We were at the end of the parking lot alone, we opened windows and skylights (it was hot) and very well. And at 8 in the morning asking for breakfast at the patisserie.

title: (46012) Valencia - 11 Avenida Gola del Puchol

title: (46012) València - 533D Carretera Rio
description: Nice wide spot for at least 30 campers. Lots of sun. 200m walk to shops. Close to the sea. Great for one night.

title: (46822) Bolbaite - 24 Avenida del Catorce
description: Parking area within the town. Just 10 minutes walk to see the Bolbaite River. Although in the same area of the river there is also a place to park, in high season it must be difficult so this is a good alternative

description: Gas station with water station, car wash and very friendly service

address.street: Camino de La Ermita dels Sants de La Pedra

title: (46012) València - 10 Plaça Num 35
description: Facing the very quiet sea in the natural park

title: (46200) Paiporta - 48G Carrer Marqués del Turia
description: Quiet area on the outskirts of Paiporta in public parking.

title: (46012) València - 10 Plaça Num 35
description: Currently SATURATED with vehicles and it seems that with time restrictions. Before it was a quiet area, with some other AC and vehicles that spend the day on the beach. Beach with a nature reserve for walks through sunny and shady areas. Tracks with bike lanes, running or walks, also nearby multi-sport and children's activity parks. There are trash cans and containers nearby, which at least in June 2022 were cleaned every morning. Beach shower area (without soap) and NON-potable water sources, nearby bars.

title: (46910) Valencia - 5I Calle Sector 1 Ab
description: Ikea carpark, surface carpark has no height limit. Felt very safe leaving the van for a day out in Valencia centre. Massanassa train station 10 mins walk, 10 mins travel time and 3.50euros return. Ikea toilets, cafes and free WiFi - (coffee free with Ikea family card). Small play park across road near entrance. Very cheap fuel station which you will walk past between the parking and train station. (Oct 2019 - E1.06 per litre for diesel.)

title: (46198) Dos Aguas - CV-580
description: It is a small picnic area next to the Júcar river. It is very good to spend the night if you are passing through the area. It is next to the road but you can sleep peacefully. In the morning many motorcycles and cyclists pass by. It is not to spend the day but it is fine to sleep.

title: (46388) Godelleta - 3A Calle Lugo-calicanto B
description: Alameda esplanade. Land space next to the river. We spent the night in the middle of July alone. Not many mosquitoes. A bit of music noise, but it was Saturday.

title: (46012) València - Unnamed Road
description: Parking, clean close to the sea very pleasant, it's been two years that we stop there when we pass in Valence never had any problem to recommend any restaurant service nearby. Forbidden to sleep.

title: (46419) el Mareny Blau - 1D Carrer Mar Blau N-11
title_short: (46419) el Mareny Blau - 1D Carrer Mar Blau N-11
description: Parking at the foot of the beach. without services urbanized area and with buildings around.

title: (46821) Chella - 4 Calle Rio Sellent
description: Roadside in an undeveloped industrial area. Far enough away from the main road so very quiet. No shade, no service or bins

title: (46198) Millares -
description: Parking of the Yacimiento de las Icnitas. about 7-10 parking spaces and some benches to eat. The site is very very quiet and allows you to see the site and then rest there. Mountain area, without coverage.

title: (46400) Cullera - 9 Carrer dels Llauradors
description: Area of large streets of urbanization without finishing good to park and close to the city center.

title: (46821) Chella - 275 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Only for vans because very complicated for motorhomes. Small car park near Salto de Chella, stuck to the road and next to the river. Two vans can be put there or even three. I stayed there the night of December 23rd. It's next to the river. No toilet, water to 25mts.

title: (46012) Albufera - 552 Carrera del Riu
description: Bus 25 passes right opposite to go to Valencia, highly recommended. Each plot has its electricity. The bathrooms, although we didn't use them, are very good, with showers included in the price, very economical and you have to leave the next morning before noon, otherwise you pay again for a night

title: (46408) Cullera - 805C Plaça Numero 19 Dosel
description: Parking next to the dunes just 30 meters from the water. I spent two nights in May and was not bothered by anyone. for the day they only separated 3 cars. Less than 1 km away there is a drinking fountain on a soccer field. The site was pretty clean.

title: (46408) Mareny de Sant Llorenç - 85B Plaça Numero 19 Dosel
title_short: (46408) Mareny de Sant Llorenç - 85B Plaça Numero 19 Dosel
description: Very quiet parking possibility, nicely protected from view by reeds or flowering bushes. About 30m to the natural beach (a beautiful wooden staircase leads over the dunes to the beach, there bird nature reserve), sound of the sea when falling asleep. Were absolutely alone there at night. No street noise, no artificial lighting - complete silence. We cleared away some of the rubbish lying around. No prohibition signs. Driveway a bit narrow, as there are flowering bushes on both sides, but went with a 6m mobile home. Packed with beachgoers during the day.

title: (46910) Alfafar - 4A Calle Profesora Ana Rojo
description: Simple location, no service. Trash cans nearby. There is plenty of parking on the side streets and businesses open around 8 a.m.

title: (46400) Cullera - 8 Barrio San Juan
description: Access by road up the mountain, unevenness and two-way curves, but there is no one, it is very quiet and the views are spectacular, of the sea, the lagoon and the river, an amazing walk there. There are no services and there is only room for a van, there is a bit of unevenness but it is safe to park on the side. I loved it.

title: (46408) Cullera - Unnamed Road
description: Perfect to pass the night. Space for 1 van, not recommended for motorhomes. No hassle

name: Camping Valencia el Saler
title: (46012) Camping Valencia el Saler
description: Welcome to the Camping Valencia el Saler Camping Valencia el Saler offers one of the best alternatives in the four seasons of the year, located in the Natural Park of the Albufera (lake, majal, forest and beach) form a unique variety in the Valencian Community to 8 kilometers from the city of Valencia. All this makes our camping a recommendable choice for any visitor, either in search of activities in full nature or visiting the city with the option of using public transport (bus) from the door of the campsite .

title: (46400) Cullera - 229A Camí Molí Cremat
description: Drinking water point, provide thief plug because house tap, push button, good flow

name: Camping Park El Saler
title: (46012) Camping Park El Saler
description: Camping Park El Saler is a small camping site with all necessities you need. The facilities are a bit old, but very clean and therefore still nice. It is located close to the bus lines 24 and 25 that take you directly to Valencia centre town. The beach is also in walking distance. Overall a nice place to stay for visiting Valencia!

title: (46400) Cullera - 229 CV-605
description: Public scale, also for campers.

title: (46821) Chella - 8 Bajada Lavadero
description: Car park near the waterfalls of chella! water fountains, children's playground and public bathroom!(no shower)

title: (46910) Alfafar - 108 Poligono 14
description: Water Tap, Municipal Drinking Water for Children's Play Park, Good Pressure, Not threaded but suitable for a "Water Theif ^TM" or rubber adapters. Tapside parking accessible for 10mt. hose.

title: (46408) Cullera - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place for a van/RV with a great view of Cullera!

title: (46400) Cullera - 47 Carrer Villa Segura
description: It is the end of one of the paths that climb Mount Cullera along the slope that overlooks the coast, following the access to the meteorological radar. The views are spectacular from here. There are no services, not even a trash can, but the place is good enough to spend the night. Of course, I would avoid coming in high season because there are many stops along the way and it seems to be an area used as a riding school or to go up with the car to play music.

title: (46408) Cullera - Cami del Segon Collado
description: Nature full parking in the gravel. Entry may be a bit narrow for a camper. Quiet. At about 1.5 km from the commercial area.

title: (46012) Valencia -
description: El Saler car park. Nice and large parking lot a few meters from the beach. Rubbish bins, beach showers, drinking water fountains and a bar called Mikkenos with public toilets. Nice walk in the nature reserve. Several parking lots with lots of parking possibilities. Schöafen possible without problems but setting up tables is forbidden and the police patrol regularly. Dogs allowed on the beach off-season (approximately from September to May). The bus runs regularly into the city (journey time approx. 20 minutes)

title: (46400) Cullera - 2 Carrer Ribera Baixa
description: We stayed two quiet nights. there is a park with a water fountain. Garbage cans. nearby is the mercadona supermarket and the petrol station. 20 min walk to the center via a small bridge.

title: (46012) Valencia - Unnamed Road
description: Spacious parking, close to the beach on foot.

title: (46210) Picanya - 36 Carrer Mariana Pineda
description: Casual parking in urban area VERY GREEN AREA, trees, lawn, ...... bike lane. Very quiet and SAFE semi-detached housing area. Large parking area and very empty of vehicles. Just behind it is a very large grocery store (open Monday to Saturday from 9:00 a.m. to 9:30 p.m.). There is a fountain in the grassy area, you can catch some water. You have a bike lane in front of you that connects the entire municipality, very fun ... route with a bicycle or scooter, RECOMMENDATION: Visit orchard houses (Calle Orihuela) ....... the town is small, about 11,000 inhabitants. You have the metro station at the end of the avenue. You go down the stairs and go under the bridge to access where you buy tickets. Very close to the motorway exit... put in GPS: Av Sanchis Guarner, behind the covered municipal swimming pool. You can enter in GPS: - Av Sanchís Guarner 28 (just behind the indoor pool) It is a beautiful area of a quiet town. In summer you can take the table and chairs out to the lawn for DINNER (The residents of the area usually do it, the Local Police allow it). Very very clean and very safe town. PLACES TO EAT/DINE: -Peanflo (Plaza Mayor) -La Seu (Picanya sports center, food only). -The Crank (Avenida l'Horta). *In summer I recommend having a horchata (a typical Valencian fresh drink, it is a very small horchateria, just a bar to serve) It is located in the Plaza del País Valenciano, near the Peanflo. **OPEN ONLY IN MAY- JUNE - JULY - AUGUST -SEPTEMBER

title: (46400) Cullera - 26 Carrer Benicull
description: Gas station with gas and to refill non-potable water

title: (46910) Alfafar - 30 Avinguda de la Albufera
description: Laundry. Tumble dryer

title: (46012) Valencia - 513 Carrera del Riu
description: A good way to fill up the motorhome.

title: (46400) Cullera - 1 CV-605
description: Laundromat, bar, gas station with water, Chinese bazaars and Mercadona supermarket. Market very well.

title: (46400) Cullera - 4C Urbanización Monte Sant Antoni
description: Cullera viewpoint with parking

name: Camping "CollVert"
title: (46012) Camping "CollVert"
description: Camping "CollVert" 200 meters from the sea, along the bike path to Valencia (8 km), quiet and spacious. Services for motorhomes bus in front of the entrance of camping number 25 about 25 minutes to go to the old town which is the terminus

title: (46400) Cullera - 65 Plaça Numero 23
description: We have stopped for a lunch. Lovely river with plenty boats. Very spacious.

title: (46389) Turís - 45A Avenida Blasco Ibáñez
description: Laundry la colada, you can park well on parallel streets, we have a pharmacy and bars nearby. good price. They open from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.

title: (46821) Chella - 9 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Nice place with tables to eat, complicated entrance for a / c nice views of small lake, we have not slept, and I see it very complicated well to spend a few hours and rest

title: (46408) Mareny de San Lorenzo -
description: Naturist beach car park. Lots of space, narrow, sandy and difficult road but the area is peaceful although poorly maintained and dirty. Be careful where you put the wheels, it quickly gets stuck in the sand if you venture a little far to the right.

title: (46821) Chella - 178 Avenida Constitución
description: Llanita area, where the information and tourism guy told us to spend the night. Attached to a road with little traffic, near the supermarket at the entrance.

title: (46821) Chella - 7 Calle Miguel Hernandez
description: Street with the possibility of taking water and a picnic area and right in front of the Consum supermarket

name: Camping Santa Marta
title: (46408) Camping Santa Marta
description: Camping Santa Marta. near Denia. Beach 5 minutes walk, good shade.

title: (46910) Sedaví - 7001 Plaça Numero 4
description: Gpl

title: (46400) Cullera - 91 Carrer del 25 d'Abril
description: Laundromat Open Blue with very good machines, you can pay with coins, bills or credit card, wash 15kg, dry 25mn, machines at the entrance with drinks, opening hours: 8:00 to 22:00

title: (46667) Barcheta - 7 Partida la Judía
description: Nice picnic site next to the town sports center, barbecue area and children's park we have spent the day but you could even spend the night

title: (46400) Cullera - 167 Plaça Numero 22
description: Large car park near town centre very suitable for campervans. Carpark is a gritted surface.

title: (46817) Estubeny - Camino de Ronda
description: 4x4 is not absolutely necessary. the place is very quiet, but somewhat transparent from the small village diagonally opposite. We drove through the village and a car saw us on the other side of the street / mountain side, but nobody said or asked us anything.

title: (46017) València - 1D Calle Pai la Torre
description: Quiet parking lot. Lots of room all year round. It is on the outskirts of Valencia. There is a park with several fountains nearby. RV wash nearby. LIDL supermarket where you can park your car to buy 3 min. Public transport 5 minutes away which takes you to the center in 15 minutes. Consume 10 min walk. And all kinds of services on Av Real de Madrid, where there is a bakery, a hardware store, a pharmacy... it's a main street. You also have right next to this car park, a cycle path that takes you throughout the city of Valencia.

title: (46400) Cullera - 4D Urbanización Monte Sant Antoni
description: Legal space to park. Quiet place Many fishermen in the morning
